text: The Flintstone Kids is an animated television series, based on the childhood years of The Flintstones. This page lists the show's episodes ==Series overview== ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (1986–87)=== The first season consists of 26 episodes. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%; margin:auto;" ! style="background-color: #554c99; color:white;" | No. in series ! style="background-color: #554c99; color:white;" | No. in season ! style="background-color: #554c99; color:white;" | Title ! style="background-color: #554c99; color:white;" | Written by ! style="background-color: #554c99; color:white;" | Original air date |- |} ===Season 2 (1987–88)=== The second and final season consists of eight episodes. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:100%; margin:auto;" ! style="background-color: #8A4500; color:white;" | No. in series ! style="background-color: #8A4500; color:white;" | No. in season ! style="background-color: #8A4500; color:white;" | Title ! style="background-color: #8A4500; color:white;" | Written by ! style="background-color: #8A4500; color:white;" | Original air date |- |} ==References== Category:Lists of American children's animated television series episodes Category:The Flintstones
title: List of The Flintstone Kids episodes
